tweet: Now, I'm delivering over a billion dollars to every county in Pennsylvania to help us combat it — and support treatment and resources for survivors and families.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Opioid addiction has devastated countless families and ravaged communities across PA — and all because of the greed of pharmaceutical companies.  This is a crisis that affects every one of us, and that's why I've taken action to hold Big Pharma accountable for manufacturing it.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: No Pennsylvanian should have to work more than one good-paying job to put food on the table.  We have to raise the minimum wage in Pennsylvania. $7.25/hr doesn't cut it in 2022. #RaiseTheWage

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Ghost guns have become the weapon of choice for criminals in PA.  They’re untraceable, DIY firearms that can be assembled at home — and they're a risk to public safety.  We are working every day to get them off our streets. It's time to close the ghost gun loophole.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: I've never wavered in my support for a woman's right to choose — and as Governor, I never will.

name: Josh Shapiro

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: We'll place at least one mental health counselor in every school building in Pennsylvania, invest in telemedicine options, and ensure our schools have adequate resources to support our children.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Too many students are suffering in silence and it's on us to step up, take action — and do whatever it takes to meet their needs right now.  As Governor, I'll fully fund our schools and make our children's mental health a priority.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Automatic voter registration, early in-person voting, and same-day voting — are all things we can implement in Pennsylvania to strengthen our democracy.  But first — we need to win.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Without unions, Pennsylvania's economy would slow to a halt.  Here's the truth: our unions keep us moving, and it's critical we protect them.  As Governor, I always will.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: As Attorney General, I've taken on Big Pharma, predatory lenders, and Donald Trump in court — and I've won.  As Governor, I'll continue fighting to hold accountable those who look to screw over Pennsylvanians.  I'll always be in your corner.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: We need to empower students with the skills necessary to succeed in whatever path they choose.  As a parent to four children, you can bet that's what I'll do as Governor.  I'll fight to fully fund our schools and create opportunities for our kids to shape their own future.

tweet: Let me be clear: this campaign is a partnership of rural, suburban, and urban communities — and we’re leaving no neighborhood behind.  We’re ALL in.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: I have a record of shaking up government and getting things done, and I’ll continue delivering results as your next Governor.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: As AG, I’ve restored integrity to an office in need of leadership and delivered real results for Pennsylvania families — from student loan debt cancellation to opioid epidemic relief.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: As Commissioner, I inherited a financial mess, but I got to work and led a fiscal turnaround that put Montgomery County back on track to a AAA bond rating.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: As State Rep, I helped write and pass some of the toughest ethics laws in Pennsylvania history.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Every eligible voter should be able to cast their ballot on Election Day — and that's why as Governor, I'll sign a bill to implement same-day voter registration in Pennsylvania.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Communities across PA are facing officer shortages so drastic that when folks call for help, there’s a chance nobody shows up.  Your family deserves to feel safe in your community — and filling the officer shortage with properly trained law enforcement is one step in doing it.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: We're going to revitalize our economy by investing in our working families — and making Pennsylvania the best place in the country to do business.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Step 1. Legalize recreational marijuana.  Step 2. Expunge the records of those with non-violent marijuana-related offenses.  Step 3. Grow our economy.  Pennsylvanians support those steps. We've got to get it done.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: We can’t let Pennsylvania fall behind.  As Governor, I’ll build a modern, dynamic economy that works for everyone.  A Republican Governor would reward the special interests.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: As Governor, I'll implement automatic voter-registration, establish early in-person voting, and protect mail-in voting in Pennsylvania.  A Republican Governor would undermine our democracy in one of the most important swing states in the country.  Those are the facts.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Pennsylvania wouldn’t last a day without the women in our workforce.  An honest day’s work deserves fair pay. It’s 2022 — close the wage gap. #EqualPayDay

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: That feeling when you sign your own petition. ☺️  Thank you. By circulating and signing petitions, you've gotten in the game — and I'm proud to have you with me.  https://t.co/80QtuquOEr

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: What’s the difference between Colorado, New Jersey, New York, and Pennsylvania?  Three are states, and one is a Commonwealth — and the three states legalized recreational marijuana and have minimum wages over single digits.  Pennsylvania, let’s get it done.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: I’m running to be a Governor you can count on — and we’re getting on the ballot because of the hard work of folks across the Commonwealth.  To every Pennsylvanian who’s been collecting petitions in snow, rain, or shine — thank you.  https://t.co/7EWq37jjF7

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: ShaPIro. That's my #PiDay tweet.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: For years, Republicans in Harrisburg have tried to undermine our democracy — but they've failed to restrict our voting rights thanks to our Democratic Governor's veto pen.  That veto pen is on the ballot this year. We must protect it.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Reproductive rights are on the ballot this year — and the stakes have never been so high.  We are going to save the right to choose by electing a pro-choice, pro-equality, and pro-democracy Governor.  I'm Josh Shapiro, and I'm running to be that Governor.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Big Pharma manufactured a national crisis that's devastated communities across PA — and I held them accountable.  Now, I'm delivering $1 billion in relief for victims of the opioid epidemic so that we can improve access to treatment.  I'll keep delivering results as Governor.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Every Pennsylvanian deserves access to affordable health care and prescription drugs.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: To best serve our communities, officers need time and space to build real relationships with the public — and that means getting out of  patrol cars and engaging with neighborhoods they serve.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: We have an opportunity to deliver some of the most substantial progress on voting rights, reproductive rights, and equal rights in Pennsylvania’s history.  It’s all on the line this year.   We can win this.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: I’ve never been shy about protecting the right to choose, and I won’t stop now.  We must protect choice in Pennsylvania.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Our far-right Republican opponents are willing to bend their platform to accommodate wherever they think they'll get the most votes.  Not me.  I've always defended democracy. I've always protected the right to choose. I've always fought for our workers. That will never change.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: I'm raising my family in Pennsylvania.  I'm committed to making this a place where you'll want to raise yours.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Republicans in Harrisburg have been waging war on our labor unions for years — and a Republican Governor is all they need to bulldoze the progress our unions have delivered for Pennsylvania workers.  Our unions and Pennsylvanian workers deserve better.

tweet: As Governor, I'll veto any bill that undermines our right to vote-by-mail in Pennsylvania.  Republicans in Harrisburg passed our vote by mail law — and now they're trying to overturn it.  I will not let Pennsylvania step backward.
